import React from 'react' import Edit from './edit' const DisplayCards = (props) => { const [showUpdateForm, setShowUpdateForm] = useState(false) const showForm = () => { setShowUpdateForm(true) } return ( <>
{props.location.location}

{props.location.city}

{props.location.rating} Stars

{showUpdateForm ? : }
) } export default DisplayCards
